name: Biomni: Detect and Annotate Somatic Mutations
description: Detects and annotates somatic mutations in tumor samples compared to matched normal samples. Uses GATK Mutect2 for variant calling, GATK FilterMutectCalls for filtering, and SnpEff for functional annotation of somatic mutations.

tumor_bam.description: Path to the tumor sample BAM file

normal_bam.description: Path to the matched normal sample BAM file

reference_genome.description: Path to the reference genome FASTA file

snpeff_database.description: SnpEff database to use for annotation

output.description: Research log summarizing the steps performed and results obtained

author: Biomni
